A lot of people are saying really negative things about this reboot. To that I say, itâ€™s a reboot!! Things are going to be changed things are going to be updated and modernized. Think about the last book to movie adaptation you saw. Was it the same? NO! They are changing and updating to fit with the time that it is being released. Also this is a TV show they need to change things to make a plot that can span over a season. So to everyone hating on this and saying that it is â€œnot there heathersâ€ I say, this is not the heathers movie of musical. This is a modernized updated version for a 2018 audience. They are trying to make different points with a different message! It is itâ€™s own separate entity!! #update #2018 #different #heathersparamount

This is hilarious. It satirizes something it seems many feel is a classic to point out the apparently not so obvious truth that morbidly obese, homosexual, and gender queer (that seems to be the latest word for it now) individuals can be shitty people, too. It's an almost perfect reversal of what the media has been throwing at us for a decade. The fact that so many comments are so toxic about just the idea that a fat girl can be a horrendous bully to a healthier girl proves that this has been sorely needed for a while.
